name: Cult Classic
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 40 in 72 hours. Requires 4 controllers and players.

In Cult Classic you must pummel and kill your fellow cult members in an attempt to channel the power of a demon.

Punch each other to spill blood on the floor, powering up the pentagram.

Once it has enough power, use the pentagram to go demonic!

You can use the knife to kill players, but be careful, they can kill you back.

Made by Team WWHAC
  • Michael Arcadi
  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Ian Wang
  • Josh Garcia
